aliases: Mr. Umbala "Liege to the king of Beasts"
doc.identity: The general populace of Earth is unaware of Sekmet's existence
doc.knownrelatives: Neith (Gaea, grandmother), Nun (Demiurge, grandfather), Ammon Ra (Atum, father), Thoth (uncle), Shu (brother), Bast (Panther God, brother), Tefnut (sister), Khonshu (Chons, half-brother), Mahes (Apedemak, nephew) Geb  (nephew), Nut (niece), Osiris, Seth (grandnephews), others
doc.powers: Sekhmet possessed enormous power, however in his Lion God incarnation his powers appeared to be substantially limited. This was a spirit form requiring a host, teleportation, size-changing, superhuman strength, speed, stamina and durability, density-altering and impervious to pain. He always appeared when summoned but required a human sacrifice.
